physical_appearance:Bordering the main image are gold and white floral arabesques. Central to the scene are three white horses
 upon which sits a man each. They are depicted to be bent over with a sword in their right hand; in the act of slashing their preys. Pratap Chand hunted a gazelle
 whilst his other two companions brought down a boar and a young pig. In the distance to the right
 two deers have been depicted to be hurrying off into the confines of the bushes.

metadata.title_text: Mian Pratap Chand of Lambagraon hunting with the minister Shiva
metadata.physical_appearance: Bordering the main image are gold and white floral arabesques. Central to the scene are three white horses, upon which sits a man each. They are depicted to be bent over with a sword in their right hand; in the act of slashing their preys. Pratap Chand hunted a gazelle, whilst his other two companions brought down a boar and a young pig. In the distance to the right, two deers have been depicted to be hurrying off into the confines of the bushes.
